MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, but don't yet know what repairs will be required.  We are sorry we can't give you a time of restoration at present.  If you wish to call back later we will be able to give you more information.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:35am. Our engineers are on their way to St Brydes substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:06am on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
